## Welcome!

I am a postdoctoral fellow in the Division of Biostatistics at the NYU Grossman School of Medicine. My research interests include missing data, public health and public health policy, trial design, air pollution, directional statistics, spatial statistics, and causal inference.

## Education

- (2019-2024) PhD in Statistics | University of Connecticut | Storrs, CT
  - Advised by Dr. Ofer Harel

- (2016-2019) BS in Mathematics (emp. Statistics) - Minor in Computer Science | University of Wisconsin-Whitewater | Whitewater, WI

- Undeclared (2015-2016) | University of Wisconsin-Madison | Madison, WI
